title: Question about the Star guardian icon and border

replies.body: Hey I checked into this for you, and it looks like the icon is tied to the border- even if it's not equipped.  The only way to remove the border would be to remove the icon.  If this is something you really want to do, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll see if we can find some options for you.
